video.title: My Name Is Earl
video.synopsis: After he wins the lottery, lifelong loser and petty criminal Earl Hickey decides to rectify his mistakes by helping everyone he has wronged.

episodes.synopsis: After a lifelong ne'er-do-well loses a winning lottery ticket, he decides that karma is getting back at him for all his misdeeds.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Earl tries making up for all the secondhand smoke he's inflicted on the world, and confesses to a man who served time for a crime Earl committed.
episodes.title: Quit Smoking

episodes.synopsis: Earl tries to make up for having Randy fix a high school football game years ago so he could win a bet with a bookie.
episodes.title: Randy's Touchdown

episodes.synopsis: Earl recalls how he faked his death in order to end a relationship with a clingy girl. When he spots her again, Earl decides to tell her the truth.
episodes.title: Faked My Own Death

episodes.synopsis: To compensate for having made fun of people's accents, Earl teaches English to a group of immigrants. An old friend gets out of prison.
episodes.title: Teacher Earl

episodes.synopsis: Earl decides to make up for breaking Joy's fancy figurine, and learns that the only way to get a new figurine is to win one in a beauty pageant.
episodes.title: Broke Joy's Fancy Figurine

episodes.synopsis: Early tries making up for having stolen beer from a golfer, but the simple job proves to be surprisingly complicated.
episodes.title: Stole Beer from a Golfer

episodes.synopsis: Hurt when he isn't invited to Joy and Darnell's wedding, Earl shows up anyway, but ruins it when he accidentally breaks Joy's nose.
episodes.title: Joy's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Earl decides to make up for having ruined his father's shot at being elected mayor, so he registers Carl as a candidate for mayor without telling him.
episodes.title: Cost Dad the Election

episodes.synopsis: Earl and Randy try to win a new car for Joy as part of Earl's attempt to make up for having ruined a number of her Christmases.
episodes.title: White Lie Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Earl decides to make up for having burned down a barn when he was young, but Earl is surprised and angry when Randy confesses that he did it.
episodes.title: Barn Burner

episodes.synopsis: Earl fills in for an employee at a fast-food restaurant, but when the man's boss mistreats his staff, Earl is sure that karma will set things right.
episodes.title: O Karma, Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: With some help from his old criminal gang, Earl tries to put a well-liked hot-dog vendor back in business.
episodes.title: Stole P's HD Cart

episodes.synopsis: Earl attempts to bring a prisoner three things he asked for, but the quest turns out to be easier said than done. Randy searches for a job.
episodes.title: Monkeys in Space

episodes.synopsis: Earl takes his car troubles as a sign that it's time for him to redeem himself for a long run of stealing gas out of a complete stranger's car.
episodes.title: Something to Live For

episodes.synopsis: Earl decides to make amends for stealing a laptop. He returns it to its owner, a sexy female professor, and they become attracted to each other.
episodes.title: The Professor

episodes.synopsis: Earl realizes that he didn't pay taxes on all his income and tries to give the government a check for what he owes.
episodes.title: Didn't Pay Taxes

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Earl try to do something nice for their mom for Mother's Day. Earl's mom asks him to do something special for his father.
episodes.title: Dad's Car

episodes.synopsis: Randy attempts to stop Earl from returning a stolen take-a-number machine, as it holds a special meaning for him.
episodes.title: Y2K

episodes.synopsis: Earl attempts to help a 12-year-old boy conquer his fear of the dark and the boogeyman.
episodes.title: Boogeyman

episodes.synopsis: Earl wants to make things right with his ex-girlfriend, Jessie, whom he dumped when he abruptly married Joy. Jessie wants revenge against Joy.
episodes.title: The Bounty Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Earl makes amends for stealing a police officer's badge after he discovers that the theft resulted in the officer's demotion.
episodes.title: Stole a Badge

episodes.synopsis: Earl attempts to reunite a father and daughter to make amends for having shot the daughter with a BB gun when they were kids.
episodes.title: BB

episodes.synopsis: In order to cross number one off his list, Earl decides he must part with all of his lottery winnings.
episodes.title: Number One

episodes.synopsis: Earl takes Joy's side when she gets into an argument with Darnell; this causes Earl to get involved in a scheme involving an entertainment center.
episodes.title: Very Bad Things

episodes.synopsis: When Joy's latest crime causes her to face life in prison, everyone looks to Earl to save the day.
episodes.title: Jump for Joy

episodes.synopsis: As Earl helps Catalina give another hotel maid a lip wax, he is reminded of Maggie Lester, a girl he made fun of in junior high.
episodes.title: Sticks & Stones

episodes.synopsis: Earl scratches No. 56 off his list when he returns a prizewinning cat back to its owner -- after sabotaging a cat show in Joy's favor.
episodes.title: Larceny of a Kitty Cat

episodes.synopsis: While trying to make amends for kicking the lead singer out of his band, Earl unexpectedly comes to face-to-face with No. 51 on his list.
episodes.title: Van Hickey

episodes.synopsis: Earl takes on No. 12 on his list when Joy needs a restraining order lifted to improve her image.
episodes.title: Made a Lady Think I Was God

episodes.synopsis: Needing a change of pace, Catalina helps Earl with an item on his list; this leads to the discovery of two undelivered letters.
episodes.title: Mailbox

episodes.synopsis: In order to check off No. 26 on his list, Earl and Randy must live an environmentally conscious life on a commune for a week.
episodes.title: Robbed a Stoner Blind

episodes.synopsis: While teaching Kenny how to be a man, Earl and Kenny both become addicted to gambling. Earl's gambling indirectly leads to Catalina's deportation.
episodes.title: Born a Gamblin' Man

episodes.synopsis: After Earl's negligence gets Catalina deported, he and Randy go on a mission to Mexico to retrieve her.
episodes.title: South of the Border: Part Uno

episodes.synopsis: After Earl's negligence gets Catalina deported, he and Randy go on a mission to Mexico to retrieve her.
episodes.title: South of the Border: Part Dos

episodes.synopsis: Earl, Randy, Joy, Darnell and the Crab Shack regulars relive their 15 minutes of fame as they watch a repeat of the show "Cops" that featured them.
episodes.title: Our 'Cops' Is On!

episodes.synopsis: Earl learns that an antique set of silverware he stole and buried has been stolen again.
episodes.title: Buried Treasure

episodes.synopsis: The man Earl once locked in a truck dies in a freak accident, so Earl decides to provide him with a proper funeral.
episodes.title: Kept a Guy Locked in a Truck

episodes.synopsis: Earl attempts to make a former foreign-exchange student he taunted love America again. Randy professes his love to Catalina.
episodes.title: Foreign Exchange Student

episodes.synopsis: While preparing for her trial, Joy discovers that her lifelong mortal enemy, Liberty Washington, is her half sister.
episodes.title: B.L.O.W.

episodes.synopsis: Earl hopes to spend his birthday party reflecting on all the good deeds he has done, but his family and friends would rather rehash all his misdeeds.
episodes.title: The Birthday Party

episodes.synopsis: With Joy pregnant again, Earl looks back on her pregnancy during their marriage and how his father was responsible for one of his first good deeds.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming Out of Joy

episodes.synopsis: When Randy is left out of a news report about Earl and his list, he decides to strike out on his own, creating his own list and karma.
episodes.title: Harassed a Reporter

episodes.synopsis: Earl and the gang find out how Little Chubby became a good person; in order to cross him off his list, Earl learns about sacrifice.
episodes.title: Two Balls, Two Strikes

episodes.synopsis: After the humiliation of being turned down for a credit card due to his lack of education and employment, Earl decides it's time to become an adult.
episodes.title: G.E.D.

episodes.synopsis: When Earl decides to get a real job at an appliance store, he gets his first experience in workplace politics. Joy prepares for going to jail.
episodes.title: Get a Real Job

episodes.synopsis: Earl finally gets his life on track with a new job, apartment and love interest, but his testimony during Joy's trial may bring it all crashing down.
episodes.title: The Trial

episodes.synopsis: After falsely confessing to a crime so that Joy won't go to jail, Earl faces the reality of his actions as he is sentenced to two years in prison.
episodes.title: My Name Is Inmate #28301-016: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Earl finds himself compromising his ethics in order to keep Glen at bay. Meanwhile, Joy decides to teach Randy how to be self-reliant.
episodes.title: My Name Is Inmate #28301-016: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With karma back on his side, Earl is approached by the jail warden to help resolve the problem of feuding black and Latino gangs.
episodes.title: The Gangs of Camden County

episodes.synopsis: Earl encounters a fellow prisoner named Frank, an old friend and Joy's former co-worker. Frank reflects on his long and winding road to prison.
episodes.title: The Frank Factor

episodes.synopsis: After taking a creative writing class, Earl can't come up with a story and finds out that his imagination isn't so vivid.
episodes.title: Creative Writing

episodes.synopsis: It's conjugal visit day at the prison, and Frank is stuck in the hotbox again. He asks Earl to explain to his girlfriend why he can't see her today.
episodes.title: Frank's Girl

episodes.synopsis: A locally filmed episode of the reality TV show "Cops" features a wealth of bad behavior that is all tied to Earl and the gang in some way.
episodes.title: Our Other 'Cops' Is On!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Randy is about to turn off the prison TV, another Camden episode of "Cops" is shown. This time, it evolves around the events on Independence Day.
episodes.title: Our Other 'Cops' Is On!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Randy gets into a fight with Earl over who is in charge between the two of them, and he uses his guard privileges to make Earl's life difficult.
episodes.title: Randy in Charge: Of Our Days and Our Nights

episodes.synopsis: Joy is determined to induce her labor. Earl and Randy are given 48 hours to retrieve Frank, who escaped when Randy took the inmates out for ice cream.
episodes.title: Midnight Bun

episodes.synopsis: The warden offers Earl a get-out-of-jail-free card if he starts a program that will mediate disputes between inmates and their victims.
episodes.title: Burn Victim

episodes.synopsis: Earl's release day arrives, but the warden has destroyed his early-release certificates because he relies on Earl's help with various prison programs.
episodes.title: Early Release

episodes.synopsis: Finally released from prison, Earl quickly decides that his good deeds haven't gotten him anywhere and reverts to his old criminal ways.
episodes.title: Bad Earl

episodes.synopsis: Earl and Billie are both struck by cars and knocked unconscious. Earl's injuries land him in a coma, where he finds himself in alternate world.
episodes.title: I Won't Die with a Little Help from My Friends: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While his mind is still in the comatose fantasy sitcom, Earl's friends try out different stimuli to wake him up.
episodes.title: I Won't Die with a Little Help from My Friends: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With Earl still in a coma, Randy, Joy and Darnell tackle an item on Earl's list with the hopes that it will help him get better.
episodes.title: Stole a Motorcycle

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Joy continue on Earl's list to speed up his recovery. They decide to make amends for the time Earl's father had to reimburse a drug dealer.
episodes.title: No Heads and a Duffle Bag

episodes.synopsis: Randy must begin caring for Earl and helps his comatose brother to cross three more items off his list, including a wheelchair-bound pair of siblings.
episodes.title: Killerball

episodes.synopsis: Earl recovers from his coma. Believing that karma wants the two of them to be together, he tries to reunite with Billie.
episodes.title: Love Octagon

episodes.synopsis: Earl thinks he and Billie have nothing in common until he learns that she has a karma list too. He helps her make reparations to a grocery bagger.
episodes.title: Girl Earl

episodes.synopsis: When Earl learns that making up for bad things he did to women changes Billie's behavior, he picks the worst thing he ever did to women on his list.
episodes.title: Camdenites: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Resenting the fact that Earl spends more time with his list than with her, Billie tries to get his attention by undoing all of his good deeds.
episodes.title: Camdenites: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Joy attempts to scam the Make-A-Wish Foundation, it causes Earl to recall a wish he stole from a dying child.
episodes.title: The Magic Hour

episodes.synopsis: While working to make amends with their childhood neighbors, Earl and Randy discover some skeletons in the old family closet.
episodes.title: Monkeys Take a Bath

episodes.synopsis: Earl's gift to Joy keeps on giving when she contracts a flesh-eating infection on her toe from the hot tub he found on the side of the road.
episodes.title: Joy in a Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Earl and Randy try to make amends with Jerry, the man from whom they stole an RV -- but they accidentally turn him into a killing machine.
episodes.title: Stole an RV

episodes.synopsis: Earl tries in vain to cross off an amateur stunt man he cuckolded, but the man's injuries make it a challenge. Joy buys a gun after being carjacked.
episodes.title: Sweet Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Another list item has Earl arranging for Kenny to go to cheerleading camp, but it turns out it wasn't Kenny who wanted to be a cheerleader.
episodes.title: We've Got Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Earl buys Randy a car so that he can finally have something better than what Earl has, but it's stolen before he can present it to Randy.
episodes.title: Quit Your Snitchin'

episodes.synopsis: While Earl is busy planning a Halloween party for Dodge and Earl Jr., Randy befriends Catalina's visiting nephew, who's into voodoo.
episodes.title: Little Bad Voodoo Brother

episodes.synopsis: When a mysterious man moves next door to Earl and Randy, a seemingly innocuous list item becomes a life-or-death situation.
episodes.title: Sold a Guy a Lemon Car

episodes.synopsis: While Earl fixes a dent in the Crab Shack's bar, he begins to reminisce about his first anniversary with Joy, when Randy threw them a surprise party.
episodes.title: Earl and Joy's Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: A series of tornadoes hitting Camden County isn't Earl's biggest concern when he loses his list; Joy and Darnell argue over which of them is smarter.
episodes.title: Nature's Game Show

episodes.synopsis: Earl takes a walk on the wild side when he helps an old friend who's "gone native" reintegrate into society.
episodes.title: Reading Is a Fundamental Case

episodes.synopsis: When Earl finds out that Joy has continued a scam they started years ago, he makes it his mission to cross the conned man off his list.
episodes.title: Orphan Earl

episodes.synopsis: A young Earl gets his heart broken by his baby-sitter and exacts revenge by sabotaging her boyfriend's condom, causing her to get pregnant.
episodes.title: Got the Babysitter Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Joy's audition for Erik Estrada's reality show "Estrada or Nada" goes awry, forcing Darnell to take the stage to keep her from pummeling the host.
episodes.title: Darnell Outed: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of having his cover blown, Darnell is sent to a relocation facility with Joy and the kids, where they are assigned new identities.
episodes.title: Darnell Outed: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Randy assumes that karma is at work when he loses his winning lottery ticket, so he starts a list of his own. Joy is not happy with her new identity.
episodes.title: Randy's List Item

episodes.synopsis: Earl returns Mr. Turtle to Joy and Darnell at their new home in a gated community, where Joy presents him as her spiritual adviser.
episodes.title: Friends with Benefits

episodes.synopsis: Darnell's absentee father who is a covert spy arrives in Camden claiming he needs to make amends with his son.
episodes.title: My Name Is Alias

episodes.synopsis: When Dodge begs Joy to let him attend space camp, Earl recalls the fun he and Randy had at Chaz Dalton's Space Academy as kids.
episodes.title: Chaz Dalton's Space Academy

episodes.synopsis: After he apologizes to a crazy witch lady for all the trouble he caused her as a kid, Earl faces his fears and tries to make it up to her.
episodes.title: Witch Lady

episodes.synopsis: As Dodge develops feelings for a young girl in the neighborhood, Randy is reminded of the summer when he met his first love, Pinky.
episodes.title: Pinky

episodes.synopsis: When Randy complains to Earl about Joy's bullying, Earl is reminded of how he bullied little Wally back in school.
episodes.title: Bullies

episodes.synopsis: While addressing a list item concerning a local reverend, Earl realizes that he and Randy have wronged the man more than once.
episodes.title: Gospel

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of the Crab Shack disappears, Geraldo Rivera arrives to investigate. Eight years later, the story finally airs.
episodes.title: Inside Probe: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Earl and Randy become the prime suspects in what is now a murder case after a Geraldo Rivera investigative special airs.
episodes.title: Inside Probe: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Dodge tells Joy he wants Earl -- his "real father" -- to speak at Career Day, Earl realizes it's time Dodge found out who his father really is.
episodes.title: Dodge's Dad
